features: [Portable Hot Plate]--Features compact stainless steel body, this 1500W hot plate can be easily used in your busy kitchen. Perfect for small cooking area, you can place it in cabinet to save space.
[Works With All Types of Cookware]--Pots and pans ranging to 7.4", including glass and aluminum and heats cookware efficiently with minimal heat loss.

[Easy to Cook]--Powered by 1500W, provides more convenience for fast-paced life as it heats up quickly, cook food including warm sauces, scrambled eggs, grilled cheese, boil water,make soup, cook pasta and vegetables and do so much more.

[Safety & Durable]--The hot plate is durable with stainless steel housing, and its surface is smooth and easy to clean. Bottom is equipped with anti-skid feet, ensures the stability of hot plate, preventing the electric stove from moving during cooking. Automatic safety shutoff function with temperature regulated by a thermostat. Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool.

[Customer Service]--All CUSIMAX products are covered by Product Liability Insurance of United States. If there is quality issues, can get free replacement. We will provide the best service and reply within 24 hours. Note: It is normal the machine will get hot because it has higher calorific value when it works.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CUSIMAX Single Countertop Burner for Electric Cooking, Portable 1500w Electric Stove, Get Delicacy at Anytime, Anywhere! Whether you're cooking at home, office, dormitory or on the go, this single-burner hot plate adds additional cooking space and practicability wherever you need it. Portable, Highly Efficient and Safety. The CUSIMAX electric hot plate burner just has size in 7.4", because of its convenient size, this electric burner looks great setting out on any countertop. In order to facilitate your accurate temperature control, this hot plate comes with adjustable temperature heating setting that allow you to heat up food like sauce, scrambled eggs, roast cheese, soup, pasta, vegetables and so on. Especially when cooking large batches of food for parties, the electric stove is great as a cooking necessity, adding an extra stove outside your countertop burner. Having features on indicator light and non-slip feet. Robust, corrosion-resistant silver stainless steel body - built to withstand frequent use. Automatic safety shutoff function with temperature regulated by thermostat.

Features of CUSIMAX Single Burner Suitable for all types of cookwareNo radiation, safe for pregnant womenNo noise when workingCan keep food warm after power offVariable temperature control settingsLightweight and compact Whether you're cooking at home, office, dormitory or on the go, this single-burner hot plate adds additional cooking space and practicability wherever you need it.

Durable Cast-iron Cooktop High quality Cast iron heating plates and Durable stainless steel body pans or pots should be in diameter of 7.4" Work with all types of cookware. Precise Temperature Control Aadjustable thermostat control and indicator light. Stainless Steel Body Durable stainless steel body, easy to clean. Simply wipe with a damp cloth when cool completely. Compact and Light Lightweight and compact, suitable for moving to any place. After cooling, it can be stored anywhere without taking up space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I need
reviews.reviewText: I have an old, pilot style gas oven in my apartment and couldn't stand coming home to the smell of that light, burnt gas fume in my kitchen. Plus, that gas bill wasn't too nice either. SO, I started looking at my options. Found this on a good deal and had to get it.Overall, this is a really nice cook top. Being a glass top, it takes a little more time to heat up but, it gets there. Heats evenly and everything I've made on it so far has come out really well!!Cleans up easily and stores perfectly in my cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Infrared Dual Ceramic Burner Cooktop
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money. I love the gorgeous appearance of this infrared cooktop with a white marble finish on its stainless steel top, & 2 black durable glass burners which show even, bright red patterns as they heat. It looks so nice, if it wasn't designed as a portable model, I'd install it as a permanent drop-in cooktop in my cabinet. This is my 1st experience with infrared cooking, & I was amazed by how quickly & evenly it heats. I've found mine to be quiet, making no unusual noise. I have no trouble boiling water, or cooking things so they turn out exactly the same as on my gas stove. & Another bonus is it's SO much easier to clean. I've been happily using this model x2 months for all my stove top cooking, & it's doing quite well, but I'll update if anything changes. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Bad At All
reviews.reviewText: I received this item and I was excited. I enjoy having a double burner in the kitchen. They are so handy to have. All kitchens should have one. This burner is well made. It warms up very nicely.The only problem I had is the design. It is not trendy enough for me. Seemed too big and old-fashioned.The price mark was reasonable, being that everything is so costly.I purchased it to use it for every day, to boil water and warm up and cook up small meals.I did return it and ordered an upgraded model. I am sure I will like it because it does fit the decor of my kitchen. The quality of the unit is fine and fits the description. Other than being too large for the space where I use it, it is a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A huge improvement to the last one I bought.
reviews.reviewText: Earlier, I had purchased a portable dual side-by-side burner style for my basement kitchen which does not have a stove (note the original unit was a recognizable quality brand name). We wanted two full functioning burners, however we found that unit had only one side which had enough heat to cook food and bring water to a boil (however it was a bit underpowered and slow to cook and boil water compared to our main level stove), the other burner was just a warmer only and could not cook food or boil water at all which was not advertised accurately so I had Amazon pick it up. Before buying anything else, I finally did some real research rather than simply depending on brand name and review quantity and rating alone and found these units which are very powerful (high wattage rating) and cook food quickly and can bring water to a boil quick and easy. I also found that having 2 completely separate burners is a major advantage. It allows you to use any size pan by just physically moving them further apart (which was a huge problem with the dual side by side design). A little bit of knowledge is a dangerous thing. Glad I learned what I did from the original purchase so I was armed with everything I needed to know to buy the perfect burner setup. These units work very well (similar in perform to our stove), appear to be well made and are perfect for us :). Keep in mind, these are very new to us and have only been used a few times at the time of this writing, so I can not speak to the durability or longevity of these units yet but everything looks good so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats Very Fast
reviews.reviewText: OK, I've been toying with the idea of owning a hot plate to use with my iron cookware and this hot plate is absolutely perfect for my use. It's compact for easy storage and very easy to clean. I was almost put of by comments regard "slow to heat" but I decided to try it for myself and I'm glad I did. The hot plate heated to over 500° in less than a minute - PERFECT. No muss, no fuss, just plug it in, set the dial and cook. I do not prefer cooking on my range because of the mess it can create and I'm a bit of a neat freak so this hot plate works perfectly on my kitchen counter for easy cleanup. I highly recommend checking this one out - the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slow and Rust Prone
reviews.reviewText: I've had this double hotplate 1 year and 10 days. Three stars for functionality. Cons: 1) Too slow! Like, mid 20th century slow! Not very hot. Even turned up all the way, the smaller burner takes 5 minutes to melt a heaping tablespoon of butter on top of a small saucepan of peas! And yes, my pan is really flat and makes good surface contact. 2) The smallest droplets of moisture left on the heating plates, such as from a boiling splash, result in a spot of bright orange rust on the burner plate the next day. Yes, it scrubs away with a steel wool scrubber, but that's unacceptable to me. For a $60 hotplate, bought new? Nope! Buy it at a garage sale for $5...yep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing electric stove!
reviews.reviewText: We have a small apartment and this electric stove has been a saver in all aspects. It’s a high quality product and it looks good. I’m able to cook all meals without any troubles. I completely recommend it with not doubt. 10/10.

this little thing is great, cooked eggs, cooked bacon, made pasta..this thing can do it all.when you open it up, remember to peel off all the plastic and then turn it on full blast of heat to burn off anything from the burners (as mentioned in the instructions) perfect for outdoor or indoor use. really helped to keep pots warm for parties
Good for daily cooking. Meet basic requirements
Great item, Great price, Fast ship 👍
